translations: 人种志学者；民族志学者

sentences.sentence: Thor Heyerdahl, the Norwegian ethnographer and adventurer, thought the statues had been created by pre-Inca peoples from Peru.
sentences.translation: 挪威民族志学者、冒险家托尔·海尔达尔认为，这些雕像是由来自秘鲁的前印加人创造的。

sentences.sentence: Yes I am designer I can make brand-identity, interactive multimedia, run usability test play role of an ethnographer.
sentences.translation: 是的，我是一个设计者，我能做品牌识别、交互性多媒体、以人种学学者的身份进行可用性测试。

sentences.sentence: One of the most famous museums on the peninsula is Kon-Tiki which was founded by the famous ethnographer and adventurer Thor Heyerdahl.
sentences.translation: 半岛上最著名的博物馆之一是康蒂基博物馆，是由著名的民族志学者和探险家托尔·海尔达尔建立的。
